mapper.sql: database_name, table_name, index_name, stat_name, last_update, stat_value, sample_size, stat_description
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from innodb_index_stats
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into innodb_index_stats (database_name, table_name, index_name, stat_name, last_update, stat_value, sample_size, stat_description) values (#{databaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indexName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statValue,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sampleSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

database_name,

mapper.update:
update innodb_index_stats
database_name = #{record.databaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
table_name = #{record.tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
index_name = #{record.indexName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stat_name = #{record.statName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

stat_value = #{record.statValue,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sample_size = #{record.sampleSize,jdbcType=BIGINT},
stat_description = #{record.statDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update innodb_index_stats set database_name = #{record.databaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, table_name = #{record.tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, index_name = #{record.indexName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stat_name = #{record.statName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update = #{record.lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, stat_value = #{record.statValue,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sample_size = #{record.sampleSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, stat_description = #{record.statDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
